tool_description: Creates standardized photographic documentation of artwork including overall views, detail shots, and specialized lighting conditions for condition assessment and archival purposes.

photo_types.description: Types of photographs to capture (overall, detail, raking light, transmitted light)

resolution_dpi.description: Image resolution in dots per inch

color_calibration.description: Whether to include color calibration targets

scale_reference.description: Whether to include measurement scale in images

error_messages: Invalid artwork_id: Provide a valid artwork identifier from metadata record.
Unsupported photo type: Use valid photo types like overall, detail, raking light, transmitted light, UV fluorescence.
Invalid resolution: Resolution must be between 150-1200 DPI.
Empty photo types: Must specify at least one type of photograph to capture.
usage: Specify artwork and desired photo types. System will capture standardized images with proper lighting, calibration, and scale references for documentation.

file_formats.description: File formats used for image storage

lighting_conditions.description: Lighting setups used for different image types

quality_assessment.description: Assessment of image quality and completeness
